entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 PM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -39.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 01:00 AM MST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Temperature: -39.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -42.9°C
Wind: W 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:28 PM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clear. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:28 PM MST Monday 02 January 2023
